sections.heading: Assessments; when authorized.No assessment shall be made on a member for liability occurring prior to his membership
sections.text: A member may be excluded from all benefits during the time he is in default of payment of any assessment.SourceLaws 1913, c. 154, ยง 126, p. 463;R.S.1913, ยง 3263;Laws 1919, c. 190, ti
